Key Match Events: Rishabh Pant was castled by Ali Khan
Suryakumar Yadav bailed India out with a half-century stand
Arshdeep Singh took career-best figures of 4-9
Pre-Game Insights: Monank Patel, the designated captain, was out injured
USA had never played at Nassau County Stadium before
Rohit Sharma called correctly and asked USA to bat in seaming conditions
USA had a motley crew with day jobs against cricketing royalty
Post-Match Reflections: USA are still very much masters of their own fate; a win over Ireland, even a washout, will see them through, ahead of Pakistan whom they famously beat in a Super Over thriller last week
Shivam Dube's performance should give him a lot of confidence
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav struggled to hit the ball off the square and was trying to manufacture strokes
Saurabh Netravalkar shelled a chance to hand Suryakumar Yadav a vital life
Aaron Jones was switching fields every ball, running up to have a chat between deliveries
Others: India won by 7 wickets with 10 balls remaining
India chased 111 with 3 wickets in hand
USA ended up with 110 with 8 wickets in hand
